attributes.action: increase the winter fuel payments for o.a.p.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: dear prime minister do you know how cold it can be for old people like myself and my wife,we cannot afford to have the heating on for longer than during the day,we need to keep our heating on during the night.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
